name: Oppai Puzzle
description: This is a classic digital jigsaw puzzle that anyone can easily play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB+ Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10 Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,+++ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB+ Storage: 300 MB available space
